column2: "Have you returned, Elmir? You seem to have enjoyed yourself quite a bit."
"I didn't think I'd have that much fun. I was a little worried at how unexpectedly quick they broke through."
"They're more than you can imagine.... I'm sure they'll be well seasoned by the time they get here."
"Heheheheheh...! Well then, I must welcome their arrival with suitable preparations."
"It has been a long time since the last time the blood in this decaying body had any excitement."
"Heh, then I'll leave it to you, brother."
